thread.title: Passengers use seatbelts, tape to subdue rowdy drunk onboard
thread.title_full: Passengers use seatbelts, tape to subdue rowdy drunk onboard

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Passengers use seatbelts, tape to subdue rowdy drunk onboard
text:
Passengers use seatbelts, tape to subdue rowdy drunk onboard Adv: 
Jul 23, 2015 Adv: 
VLADIVOSTOK, Russia - An unruly passenger on Russia's Siberia Airlines' flight from Hong Kong to Vladivostok was drunk and insulting to other passengers. 
Fellow passengers had to jump the man and, after some punching and kicking, used seatbelts and tape to subdue him and tie him down in the aisle. Airport police was notified and the rowdy drunkard was arrested immediately upon landing at Vladivostok airport.
